content.description:
A tough, cryptic climb on inobvious holds. Climb up past three or four bolts of in your face moves until reaching the slab. Catch a break before tackling the sustained, yet easier, climbing above.

The Big Empty guide calls this 5.11a/b, but it felt at least a grade harder than the surrounding 5.11a's.
content.location: The middle line on the right wall of Shady Grove. Shares anchors with Boy's Don't Cry.

content.description: Climb up through a techy vert section to reach a slab. From here, climb up steep terrain on jugs until you reach a good sloping ledge. Contemplate the cryptic vertical section above, then pull hard on small holds to reach the easier climbing above.
content.location: Second route from the left side of Shady Grove. Look for featured climbing on yellow rock that leads to a bullet section of gray rock above.

content.description: What this climb lacks in terms of rock quality, it makes up for in quality movement. Climb past 4 bolts worth of loos'ish rock before gaining the solid crack. Layback or jam until it closes off, then head straight up to the anchor. Shares finish with Vegetable or Visionary.
content.location: The right most bolt line in Shady Grove. Look for the loose yellow rock and climb towards it.
